title: AI Chatbot Integration
longDescription: An intelligent conversational AI system that handles customer queries, provides personalized recommendations, and seamlessly escalates to human agents when needed.

contentBlocks.heading: Intelligent Understanding
contentBlocks.content: The chatbot uses advanced NLP to understand context, sentiment, and intent. It can handle complex queries, maintain conversation context, and provide accurate responses in multiple languages.

contentBlocks.heading: Continuous Learning
contentBlocks.content: We implemented a feedback loop where the system learns from every interaction. Customer satisfaction ratings and conversation outcomes are used to fine-tune the model, improving accuracy over time.

challenges: Handling ambiguous or unclear user queries
Reducing response latency for real-time chat
Training model with limited domain-specific data

testimonial.text: The AI chatbot has transformed our customer service. It handles the majority of queries instantly while freeing our team to focus on complex issues.
testimonial.author: David Park

sections.technologiesDesc: Leveraging modern tools and frameworks to build a robust solution
